title: spec: forbidden unused function arguments
body:
by **bronze1man**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
http://play.golang.org/p/7rAREh7N6P

What is the expected output?
compilation fail

What do you see instead?
abcd

Please provide any additional information below.
Since golang forbidden unused variable,It should also forbidden unused function arguments
